name: is sHE ALive ?
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Va-t-elle vivre ? Va-t-elle mourir ? Cela depend de vous petit globule blanc ! A vous de sauver votre humain de la maladie !

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Will she live? Will she die? It depends on you little white blood cell! It's up to you to save your human from illness!

By Felt38 & LastHoso
